input_text:
Job Title: Customer Service Specialist

Location: Modesto, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Sales

Description:
Employee Benefits Account Manager
Are you ready to make a meaningful impact in the insurance industry while enjoying competitive pay and incredible benefits? Look no further! Our client is seeking a proactive and personable full-time Employee Benefits Account Manager to join their team in Modesto, CA.
With a salary range of $45,000 to $60,000 per year and a comprehensive benefits package, including a 401(k) with a 3% match (after 1 year of employment), 2 paid Fridays off per month, 18 paid holidays per year, PTO, 90% company-paid health insurance for employees (50% paid for dependents), and 100% company-paid vision, dental, and life insurance, this is an opportunity you won't want to miss! Dive into a fulfilling career where your skills and dedication are valued. Apply to be an Employee Benefits Account Manager today!
OUR CLIENT:
With a rich history spanning over 95 years, our client is a full-service insurance agency that is dedicated to fostering a supportive team environment and a close-knit culture. As they continue to expand, they seek talented individuals to join their team and help them achieve their goals. They offer abundant opportunities for career advancement and growth as well as amazing benefits like health, dental, paid time off, paid vacation, and more! Join and become part of a dynamic team where your talents are valued and nurtured!
THE ROLE:
Our client offers a hybrid work model, allowing for flexible in-office presence based on the company's policy, which includes 2 paid Fridays off per month. As an Employee Benefits Account Manager, you start your day by enrolling new members and ensuring their journey is seamless. As the day unfolds, you handle claims with precision, working closely with members to resolve any issues promptly. Collaboration is key as you add or delete employees based on client requirements, ensuring their satisfaction at every step.
Your role is crucial in supporting the sales team as you contribute to the marketing, quoting, and renewal processes. With a hybrid work model offering flexibility, your day may vary between in-office and remote tasks, allowing for a balanced lifestyle. If this sounds like a good fit for you, and you meet the following requirements, apply today!
WHAT YOU NEED TO BE SUCCESSFUL:
1+ years of experience in insurance sales or customer service, preferably in property and casualty insuranceProficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and other relevant software applicationsA proactive and forward-thinking personality with excellent time management skillsA proven track record of meeting and exceeding sales targetsStrong client-facing skills and the ability to work effectively with sales teams and clients
Ready to take the next step? Don't wait any longer! Our client's initial application process is quick and easy, taking just 3 minutes on your mobile device. Join a team that values your skills and offers a supportive work environment. Apply now to be an Employee Benefits Account Manager and start your journey with them!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Employee Benefits Account Manager
output_json.summary: Proactive and personable full-time Employee Benefits Account Manager needed in Modesto, CA.
job_responsibilities: Enrolling new members and ensuring a seamless journey
Working closely with members to resolve issues promptly
Adding or deleting employees based on client requirements
Supporting the sales team in marketing, quoting, and renewal processes
benefits: Salary range of $45,000 to $60,000 per year
401(k) with a 3% match after 1 year of employment
Health insurance fully covered by the company (50% for dependents)
Vision, dental, and life insurance fully covered by the company
output_json.company_information: Full-service insurance agency with a history spanning over 95 years, dedicated to fostering a supportive team environment and a close-knit culture.
